name: d3-force-bounce
description: An elastic collision force type for the d3-force simulation engine.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3ForceBounce -o build/d3-force-bounce.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run bundle && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-force-bounce.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-bounce.min.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-force-bounce.bundle.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-bounce.bundle.min.js
